zone.line: On
You hate? alas what profit can there be
In hating such a loving thing as me
hateless

line.del: Neglectful I am cruel to your hate

zone.line: There is no sport in hate when all the rage
Is on one side — in vain would you assuage
Your frowns upon an unresisting smile
In which not even contempt as to beguile
My dearest M. wherefore hast thou gone
world
And left me in this dreary place
alone
Thy form is here indeed, amd a lovely s
But thou art fled,— gone down the
dreary road
Which leads to Sorrow's most obscure abode
Thou sittest on the hearth of pale despair
If where
For thine own sake I cannot follow there
Bu Do thou return for mine
